attributes.action: Wear bermuda shorts on a thursday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the public understand that the primeminister is an every day civilian like the rest of us. So under the circumstances of the climate changing I believe it appropriate that instead of a blazer and suit trousers the PM shall wear unfashionable shorts accompanied by a very baggy hawaiian shirt. Untill CO2 targets have been met our leader should keep wearing his shorts on a thursday as a reminder that global warming needs to be dealt with.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
